title: Eddie Gives Raymundo Harsh Wedding Advice + Matt from Old Dominion on Writing A Song With His Daughter + Riddle Me This!
itunes:title: Eddie Gives Raymundo Harsh Wedding Advice + Matt from Old Dominion on Writing A Song With His Daughter + Riddle Me This!
description:
Eddie gives Raymundo some wedding advice that doesn’t seem the most optimistic. We talk to Matt, the lead singer of Old Dominion about them writing new songs during quarantine, someone who shares a name with him and who has the biggest house in the band. We play a round of Riddle Me This!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
